alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 21 at 4:29PM CST until November 21 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 428 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneva, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Hartford, Hendrix Crossroad, Kellys Crossroads, Eunola, Lytle, High Bluff, Highfalls, Marl, Geneva Municipal A/P, Somerset, and Chancellor. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
